sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import logo from '../images/logo.svg' export default function Form() { const [data, setData] = useState('https://www.w3schools.com/js/default.asp') const [sizew, setSizew] = useState('300') const sizeh = document.querySelector('.sizeh').value const qrCodeAPI = `https://api.qrserver.com/v1/create-qr-code/?data=${data}&size=${sizew}x${sizeh}&color=15ff00&bgcolor=fffb00&margin=1&qzone=1&format=png` console.log(data) document.querySelector('.qrcode').src = qrCodeAPI return (
Input some text or URL: setData(e.target.value)} />
Size (wxh): setsetSizew(e.target.value)} /> x setsetSizeh(e.target.value)} />


); }
